name: Jet What New User
author: Jettochkin

sections.description:
En: Widget for the publication of their status, placing a note in groups

Ru: Виджет для публикации своего статуса, размещения заметки в группах

Contact

en: For suggestions, bugs, hugs and love can be donated at the following locations.
ru: Для предложений, сообщений об ошибках используйте Plugin Page
sections.installation:
EN
– Upload j-what-new-user.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory,

  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress MU,

  • Infuse field,

  • Use the widget to sidebar.

RU
– Загрузите j-what-new-user.php в директорию /wp-content/plugins/,

  • Активируйте плагин в меню Плагины WordPress MU,

  • Установите параметры,

  • Используйте виджет в Сайдбаре.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Tested compatibility with WordPress 3.0

1.0

  • Correction code, style and localization

0.4

  • The widget is not displayed on the pages of the activity and user profiles

0.3.3

  • final release for BP 1.2.3

0.3.2.1

  • Update style

0.3.2

  • The widget is not displayed for unregistered users and page activity

0.3

  • Add select avatar/title show

0.2

  • Fixed some bug’s

0.1

  • First Release.
